sense.def:
Kadar obstaja
scope for a particular kind of behaviour
, imamo priložnost, da se vedemo na določen način.

seg.quote: There is not much scope for originality.

sense.def:
The scope of an activity or piece of work
je področje, ki ga določena dejavnost ali delo obravnava ali vključuje.

seg.quote: Lack of time limited the scope of the course.
It seemed out of place in a book so limited in scope.
